title: Binary watch face
summary: Binary is an BCD coded binary Android wear watch face.
description: Binary is an BCD coded binary Android wear watch face with a lot of predefined designs and a configuration interface on your connected mobile. Please note, the app is an early release and can contains bugs.license: GNU General Public License version 3
descriptionHTML:
Binary is an BCD coded binary Android wear watch face with a lot of predefined designs and a configuration interface on your connected mobile. Please note, the app is an early release and can contains bugs.

license: GNU General Public License version 3
comments: Size is off Running on the G watch R and the size is just a bit big. Cutting off the dots regardless of the shape used.
